src_original: nirūpadravtvāt praṇītaḥ / [400/07]  sarvāpakṣālavimuktatvānniḥ saraṇamiti /  gamanārthena mārgaḥ / [400/07-400/08]  yogayuktatvānnyāyaḥ / [400/08]  samyakpratipādanārthena pratipat /  atyantasamatikramaṇānnairyāṇika iti / [400/09]
nirvāṇapurāvirodhanārthena pratipat /  sarvabhavapratipakṣatvānnairyāṇikaḥ / [400/15]  ityeṣāṃ vyākhyānamanekaparyāyaḥ /  yathābhipretaṃ pravakṣyāmaḥ /
